name: The Lost Vessel
description:
El DeV invisible

Hosted by indiedevday · #DevInvisible

  • Theme: Lovecraft,  Cosmic Horror.
  • Developed for Instituticoa!
  • Link: https://itch.io/jam/el-dev-invisible
Synopsis

What kind of horror followed this vessel on their way home? And why?

The Lost Vessel is a short narrative game inspired by the tale of H. P. Lovecraft "Dagon". As the captain of the vessel, you wake up alone in a horrible storm, unable to remember what happened to your crew. You must find out what happened to them and uncover the horror that led to their disappearence.
